Room.Name: Oceanview Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceanview Drive, about a block north of the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: The City Walls lie approximately a block to the south at Golden Dolphin Way. On the east side of Oceanview is Leonardo's Foundry. The only entrance to the foundry is located on Main Street, which runs parallel to Oceancrest, one block to the east. On the west side, there is a small gem shop entitled "Eye of the Dragon Fine Gemstones". The entrance appears to be on the south side of Waterfront Way.
